Test Scenario / Description: Verify that a user can be created successfully with valid data
Pre-Condition: Valid auth token should be available
Test Steps / Action:
1. Send POST request
2. Observe the response
Expected Result:
Status code = 201
Response body contains valid id, name, email

Test Scenario / Description: Verify response when creating user with missing email
Pre-Condition: Valid auth token should be available
Expected Result:
Status code = 422
Error message for missing field

Test Scenario / Description: Validate fetching a user by ID
Expected Result:
Status code = 200
Response body contains correct data

Test Steps / Action:
1. Send PUT request
2. Verify updated data
Expected Result:
Status code = 200
Updated name reflected in response

Test Scenario / Description: Validate deletion of a user by ID
Expected Result:
Status code = 204
User no longer accessible

Test Scenario / Description: Verify Get User by valid ID
Expected Result:
Status code = 200
User details should be returned

Test Scenario / Description: Verify Get User by invalid ID
Expected Result:
Status Code : 404
Error message “Resource not found”

Test Scenario / Description: Create a user with duplicate email
Expected Result:
Status Code : 422
Error: Email already taken

Status Code : 200
id field is integers
